cu.explanation_en: Setting the second integrity algorithm to the unknown enum 'nia5' will cause security negotiation failures and prevent UE attachment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging initialization errors and halt DU startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致日誌初始化錯誤，並停止 DU 啟動。
